wiki.summary: Similar to his previous studio albums, Bad Vibes Forever begins with XXXTENTACION divulging his mind to the listeners. However, as he is unable to talk about this posthumous release, X’s team seems to have chosen the most fitting monologue as the introduction. X demands the people to stop judging him and move on from his past mistakes like he did, as he suffered enough in his short life and he truly believed that he was becoming a better person before his death. Read more on Last.fm.
